category.name: Classification
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CLS_search_return_classified_objects
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether Classification searches return Classified objects or simply Classification objects. Valid values are: * true: In case of non stand-alone Classification objects, classified TC objects are returned. And in case of stand-alone objects, the Classification objects themselves are returned. * false: Classification objects are extracted from returned result sets. This is the default value.
